required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of K-877 in Adult Patients With Fasting High Triglyceride Levels and Normal Renal Function
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Placebo-Controlled, Randomized, Double-Blind, 12-Week Study With a 40-Week Open-Label Extension to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of K-877 0.2 mg Twice Daily in Patients With Fasting Triglyceride Levels ≥500 mg/dL and <2000 mg/dL

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of K-877 in adult patients with fasting high triglyceride levels ≥500 mg/dL and <2000 mg/dL and normal renal function.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change of Fasting Triglyceride(TG) Levels
primary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting Triglyceride(TG) levels from baseline to Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change of Fasting TG Levels
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting TG levels from baseline to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change of Other Lipid Parameters

arm_group.description: K-877 or placebo comparator twice daily for 12 weeks
K-877 with placebo matching fenofibrate or fenofibrate with placebo matching K-877 for 40 weeks
